page.title: 17FARMING(Part 2)
page.content: None of the farms has pigs .The crops grown are{oats,barley,wheat,oil-seed {rape,potatoes}and{sugar beet.}The survey found out that{ploughing}took place in{September/October, sowing}in {October/November}or{March/April. {Fertilising}the land occurred at varying times and{spraying}with insecticide or pesticide took place in {September/October}or{April/May.}One farmer said he never sprayed with anything.The rare birds seen by the farmers included{kestrels}and{curlews. The rare animals were{deer,foxes}and {badgers}and the rare plants included{ {orchids.}None of the farmers used{ {computers}to help them in the running of the farm. { { { {
